snippet: A new interview with the British journalist Peter Popham more fully illuminates Daw Aung San Suu Kyi's personal and political lives in Myanmar, adding context and dimensions beyond the usual profile of a self-sacrificing opposition leader shuttered...
abstract: A new interview with the British journalist Peter Popham more fully illuminates Daw Aung San Suu Kyi's personal and political lives in Myanmar, adding context and dimensions beyond the usual profile of a self-sacrificing opposition leader shuttered away in a crumbling villa.

headline.main: Getting Personal About Aung San Suu Kyi
